title: Modern 1BR/1BA @ Heart of Mission; Near BART
posting_body: ['If interested, please reply with your desired move-in date and full contact info.', 'Otherwise, your email will be disregarded.', 'Available on August 8th is a newly remodeled one bedroom, one bathroom apartment near 16th & Mission.', 'The unit has a modern design with all new appliances.', "It's on the 3rd floor of a 3-level building.", "Best feature is the convenient location as it's a short walk to BART and at an amazing vibrant location in the heart of the Mission.", 'Apartment can come furnished or unfurnished; we can remove any of the existing furniture.', 'Apartment features:', '1.', 'Kitchen with gas stove', '2. Bathroom with shower', '3.', 'One bedroom', '4.', 'Separate large closet', '5.', 'Hardwood floors throughout', '6.', 'Large windows for plenty of natural sunlight', '7.', 'Shared coin-op laundry in the building.', 'Convenience features:', '1.', 'Right in the heart of the Mission!', '2.', 'Two short blocks to 16th & Mission BART', '3.', 'Culture, food, entertainment all around you!', 'Building has no elevator.', 'Street parking only; we do not offer any parking.', 'No smoking and no pets.', 'Terms: 12 month lease then month-to-month.', 'Must move in within 30 days, tenant pays for PG&E, internet and water (water is $35/person)', 'Move-in fees: first month rent (will prorate), last month rent deposit, $2600 refundable security deposit', 'Applicants will need to complete application and provide references and background checks.', 'If interested, please reply with your desired move-in date and full contact info.', 'Otherwise, your email will be disregarded.']
